sentence.Network_en: Sweeten dishes sparingly with honey, or con-centrated apple or pear juice.
sentence.Network_cn: 加一点蜂蜜或浓缩苹果汁或梨汁，让菜带点甜味。

sentence.Network_en: The Australians fry their bananas and sweeten them with honey.
sentence.Network_cn: 澳大利亚人把香蕉炸了，然后再淋上蜂蜜吃。

sentence.Network_en: If you sweeten him up he'll do the work for you.
sentence.Network_cn: 你要是哄哄他,他就会帮你干活.

entry.def: If you sweeten food or drink, you add sugar, honey, or another sweet substance to it.

example.tran: 他往咖啡里加了很多糖。

example.ex: The Australians fry their bananas and sweeten them with honey.
example.tran: 澳大利亚人把香蕉炸了，然后再淋上蜂蜜吃。

entry.tran: 改善;使更合心意;使更有诱惑力
entry.def: If you sweeten something such as an offer or a business deal, you try to make someone want it more by improving it or by increasing the amount you are willing to pay.

example.ex: Kalon Group has sweetened its takeover offer for Manders...
example.tran: 卡龙集团已经向曼德斯公司开出更为优厚的收购条件。

example.ex: She had been careful to sweeten the deal with a rather generous cash payment.
example.tran: 她一直甚为审慎，想要通过支付大量现金促成这笔交易。

means.word_mean: 2. make sweeter, more pleasant, or more agreeable;

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表动词,"变成"; 2. 表形容词,"由……制成的",通常加在名词后面; 3. 表名词,"人或物"

stems_affixes.word_buile: strait海峡,困难+en变成→adj.艰难的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 金黄色的;贵重的,极好的
stems_affixes.word_buile: gold金+en由……制成的→adj.金黄色的;贵重的,极好的
oak橡树+en由……制成的→adj.橡木制的
wax蜡+en由……制成的→adj.蜡的,蜡制的
wood木头+en由……制成的→adj.木制的;呆笨的
wool羊毛+en由……制成的→adj. 羊毛[制]的;毛纺的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 未婚的,纯洁的,无经验的
stems_affixes.word_buile: maid少女+en人或物→n.少女,处女 adj.未婚的,纯洁的,无经验的
chick小鸡+en人或物→n.鸡肉;鸡,小鸡,小鸟
city城市+en人或物→citizen
heath荒野,树丛+en人或物→n.异教徒
kit=cat猫+en人或物→kitten
maid少女+en人或物→n.少女,处女 adj.未婚的,纯洁的,无经验的
vix雌狐+en人或物→n.雌狐,泼妇
ward守卫,看守+en人或物→n.看守人,管理员
bright明亮的+en变成→v.[使]变亮,[使]愉快
broad宽+en变成→v.放宽,变阔
damp潮湿+en变成→v.[使]潮湿,使沮丧,泼凉水
dark黑+en变成→v.[使]变黑[变暗]
fright惊骇,吃惊+en变成→v.使惊吓;惊恐
hast匆忙+en变成→v.催促 v.赶紧
length长,长度+en变成→v.延长,[使]变长
sharp尖+en变成→v.削尖,使敏锐
short短+en变成→v.弄短,缩小,减少
sweet甜+en变成→v.使变甜 v.变甜
threat恐吓,凶兆,威胁I+en变成→v.恐吓,威胁
tight紧的+en变成→v.变紧,绷紧,拉紧
wake叫醒+en变成→v.醒来 v.唤醒
weak弱的+en变成→v.削弱,[使]变弱
